TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed UIViewKeyframeAnimationOptions extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: An enumeration whose values specify valid options for the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype UIKit.UIViewKeyframeAnimationOptions AllowUserInteraction = unsigned int64(2)

Docs.summary: Whether the user can interact with the views while they are being animated.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype UIKit.UIViewKeyframeAnimationOptions Autoreverse = unsigned int64(16)

Docs.summary: Whether to run the animation in both directions. Must be combined with the Repeat option.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype UIKit.UIViewKeyframeAnimationOptions BeginFromCurrentState = unsigned int64(4)

Docs.summary: Whether to start an animation from the current setting of the in-flight animation. If not set, in-flight animations are allowed to finish before the new animation is started.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype UIKit.UIViewKeyframeAnimationOptions CalculationModeCubic = unsigned int64(3072)

Docs.summary: Use a Catmull-Rom spline to interpolate between keyframe values. The Catmull-Rom parameter is not available for manipulation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype UIKit.UIViewKeyframeAnimationOptions CalculationModeCubicPaced = unsigned int64(4096)

Docs.summary: Use a cubic scheme to compute intermediate frames, ignoring timing properties. Timing parameters are implicitly calculated to give the animation a constant velocity.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype UIKit.UIViewKeyframeAnimationOptions CalculationModeDiscrete = unsigned int64(1024)

Docs.summary: Does not interpolate keyframe values; jumps directly to each keyframe value.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype UIKit.UIViewKeyframeAnimationOptions CalculationModeLinear = unsigned int64(0)

Docs.summary: Use a simple linear calculation for interpolating between keyframe values.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype UIKit.UIViewKeyframeAnimationOptions CalculationModePaced = unsigned int64(2048)

Docs.summary: Use a simple even-pacing algorithm to interpolate between keyframe values.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype UIKit.UIViewKeyframeAnimationOptions LayoutSubviews = unsigned int64(1)

Docs.summary: The option to layout subviews at commit time so they animate with their parent.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype UIKit.UIViewKeyframeAnimationOptions OverrideInheritedDuration = unsigned int64(32)

Docs.summary: Whether to force an animation to use the original duration value specified when the animation was submitted. If not set, the animation inherits the remaining duration of the in-flight animation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype UIKit.UIViewKeyframeAnimationOptions OverrideInheritedOptions = unsigned int64(512)

Docs.summary: Whether to not inherit the animation type or any options.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype UIKit.UIViewKeyframeAnimationOptions Repeat = unsigned int64(8)

Docs.summary: Whether to repeat the animation indefinitely.
